document.full_text: a university medical center in omaha was locked down on wednesday after a gunman fired shots and wounded a victim inside the facility, the second such incident at the school in six months.
document.title: one person wounded in shooting at omaha hospital
lines_and_colors: a university medical center in omaha was locked down on wednesday after a gunman fired shots and wounded a victim inside the facility, the second such incident at the school in six months.
